name: A Foreign Land of Us
description:
A Foreign Land of Us is a narrative point-and-click game.

One of the main features of the game is the shift of scenes by zooming in and out on the same objects and the use of cinematic montage. A mysterious and wonderful life journey is awaiting you to explore.

Immersed in the unique art style, soothing narrative, engaging puzzles and minigames, you are going to discover the uncommon stories of the protagonist's common life.
